thoughts.text: While I appreciate your perspective, it is important to keep in mind that individuals and organizations may have their own priorities and criteria for deciding how to allocate their resources, and may not be able to accommodate every request they receive. Additionally, it may be difficult to convince someone to provide funding for projects that are not based on careful planning and consideration, as this may be seen as a risky investment. That being said, there are still ways to increase the likelihood of receiving support, such as building a strong network of contacts and supporters who can help promote your projects and connect you with potential funders, and seeking out funding opportunities from sources that are aligned with your goals and values.
